channel.title: News on UbuCon Asia 2022
channel.description: Recent content in News on UbuCon Asia 2022

item.title: UbuCon Asia 2022 - Nov 26-27 Seoul, South Korea
item.description: Introducing the first In-person UbuCon in Asia, UbuCon Asia 2022 With venue sponsorship from NIPA(National IT Industry Promotion Agency), The event will be hold at Nuritkum Square, Seoul, South Korea. Event dates will be November 26-27 We’re planning event with 3 tracks simultaneously. Talk(or Lecture) track, Workshop(or Hands on Lab) track, and BoF/Short lecture track. More details will be available on this website and social media. Save the date, and see you in Seoul!

item.title: UbuCon Asia 2022 will be on Seoul, South Korea
item.description: The UbuCon Asia 2022 will be on Seoul, South Korea. It will be an in-person and online hybrid format.
